subject: TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm Pt
body:
CNN.com - Showbiz Tonight










B>TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm
Pt

THE PARIS COUNTDOWN
    As Paris
Hilton counts the days until she gets out of jail,
Showbiz
Tonight goes right to some of Hollywood's biggest stars
to
get some very important advice for Paris, including Angelina
Jolie and Ellen Degeneres!They tell us the things Paris
must do
when she gets out!Plus, the mystery surrounding
Paris's
Father's Day family visit!Showbiz Tonight brings
you the
countdown to Paris getting out of lockdown.

ANGELINA JOLIE ONE-ON-ONE
     Angelina Jolie
with some very frank comments about ALL the
out-of-control
young Hollywood stars, from Paris to Britney to
Lindsay.
Showbiz Tonight's AJ Hammer goes one-on-one with
Angelina,
who opens about why her new movie. "A Mighty Heart"
is so
intensely personal. Jolie also talks about her family
life
with Brad Pitt and their kids!It's the revealing interview
you will see only on Showbiz Tonight.

CELEBRITY
CATFIGHTS!
Meow!!!Showbiz Tonight reveals its picks for
the meanest,
nastiest, ugliest Celebrity Catfights ever!

DADDY DEAREST DILEMMA
Even though he had
his daughter videotape him drunk out of his
mind,David
Hasselhoff has won custody of his kids from his
ex-wife,
Pamela Bach. At the same time, Alec Baldwin was back
in
court in his custody battle with ex-wife Kim Basinger
following the release of a recording of an angry cellphone
message to his daughter. Which one was worse and why would
Hasselhoff get his kids but Baldwin is barred from seeing
his
daughter? Showbiz Tonight brings you the Daddy Dearest
Dilemma!



SHOWBIZ TONIGHT QUESTION OF THE
DAY
David Hasselhoff wins custody: Are you shocked he
got the kids?

VOTE AT CNN.COM/SHOWBIZ TONIGHT

SEND US A VIDEO EMAIL
Send your response to
the Question Of The Day on video. Look
into your camera and
tell us what you think. Responses must be
no longer than 30
seconds. To send your video email, go to
cnn.com/showbiztonight.Watch your video responses on
"Showbiz
Tonight" at 
11 p.m. ET/PT on CNN Headline
Prime.
